title: 10x App Speed
shortDesc: Spearheaded deep architectural refactoring, slashing loading times by 90% and establishing global state management standards.
fullDesc: Led the end-to-end optimization (Diagnosis â†’ Assessment â†’ Refactoring) for an application suffering from severe login bottlenecks (10s+ latency). Leveraged Flipper and React DevTools to pinpoint root causes: excessive global re-renders and redundant API state resets. After assessing maintenance costs and risks, I upgraded Redux Toolkit and implemented createSelector memoization, ultimately reducing login time by 90% and significantly smoothing multi-page navigation.
